name: Villainous - Board Game Template (To Print)
description:
INTRODUCTION

I created this template as a gift to a friend. It is a VERSION TO PRINT, you will need A4 and A3 paper, recommended a bit thicker for the cards and Player Board to be more resistant.


PLAYERS

Player 1 follows the gameplay of Captain Hook.

Player 2 follows the gameplay of Maleficent.


CHARACTER TEMPLATES

  • Captain Hook
  • Cruella de Vil
  • Jafar
  • Maleficent
  • [MORE OF THEM WILL COME SOON]


MODIFICATIONS

You can update all the images and texts to make the gameplay work better for your story.

The text of the players are in French, but the Characters templates are in English.
